> Oblitertron/Dark Claw/Flesh Ripper/Demon Wulf/Sixshot/Ares/Nemesis
> Enforcer/Scattershot/Unitron/Chaos/Minion:
>
>
> Dark Claw, still in his war vehicle mode, didn't make a noise as autogun
fire
> dug slightly into his armored mode, fired off another two missiles at the
> Mafia base (it is the Mafia's, isn't it?)

The Mafia base lost another 2 auroguns, they now have 6 small ones and 3 big
ones.

> Flesh Ripper fired off three bolts from his rifle at Gigas.

Gigas was struck and kneels over. He starts his repairing sequence, leaving
him weaker. He fires a single missile at Flesh Ripper. (PS, where did you
get that odd name from?)

> Ares turned his turret, bring all four cannons to point a little ways to
the
> side of the area of the Mafia base he had been firing on.  He fired four
> shots from each cannon, a total of sixteen shots lancing out at the Mafia
> base.

Serge watched as the shots pummelled the base, the base's alarm got louder
by the second. Serge wanted it to shut up bad. He stepped in front of Ares
path and fires 4 missiles. 2 from each shoulder cannon.

> Minion yelled out as autogun fire dug into his foot.  Raising his rifle,
he
> fired off 25 explosive shells at the Mafia base.

(Is it just me, or is everybody out to destroy the damn base? Pardon me.
Heh.) The base lost a large autogun, they had 2 left as the larger autoguns
fired at Minion is retaliaton and lock on targeting.
